mapper.insert: insert into member (id, password, name, idnum, address, phone, email, hometype, space) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{idnum}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{hometype}, #{space})

insert into business (bname, bpassword, bnum, baddress, homepage, bphone, bemail, special, rate) values (#{bname}, #{bpassword}, #{bnum}, #{baddress}, #{homepage}, #{bphone}, #{bemail}, #{special}, #{rate})
